name: Word Meister Friends Free
description:
It’s your turn to join the frantic, word-building fun of Word Meister Friends!

Challenge your friends and compete to unscramble the letters and find as many words as you can. Think fast, tap quickly and charge up with mega power-ups to get mega scores, and become the Word Meister.

* Challenge your friends in 3, fast paced rounds: score the highest and win!
* Load up on Mega Power-Ups! Time Freeze, Free Word and more to gain an edge on your friends
* Enjoy fast paced, unscrambling action
* Log in with your Facebook© account to play against your friends, or compete against a random opponent from around the world (you can also log in using your email address)

Irresistibly addictive and fast-paced, Word Meister Friends is great, multiplayer fun - at home, on the bus or hanging out with your buddies.

For Ad-Free word-meistering, get Word Meister Friends: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id577831108?mt=8

Play Word Meister Friends Free today!

“Like” Word Meister Friends Free on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/WordMeisterFriends
___________________________

Word Meister Friends Free is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Office Jerk, Plumber Crack and Streaker Run. Search the App Store for “Fluik” to browse all our games.

Follow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.

NOTE:
Please don't include bug reports in your app reviews. We can't respond to you directly, so it can be difficult for us to offer help or properly debug the situation. You can post all bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, or email us via support@fluik.com
